Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.3 Ganthasampayuttaduka » 5.3.1 Paṭiccavāra » 5.3.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 5.3.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
50.
1734Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā nava, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cha, purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate nava.
1735Anulomaṃ.
